entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
